name: Planetrex
description:
i know how planets work

Controls:
W, A, S, D noob

How to play:
Move around eat smol planets and try not to get eaten by big planet but planets have gravity (thanks to Newton Einstein) planets wanna hug each other but they collapse into one becoming more heavy and hence more gravity. Go play it you will probably figure it out
